lead_paragraph: Svetlana Kuznetsova had been steamrolled in the second set and was a break down in the decider of her WTA Finals opener against defending champion Agnieszka Radwanska on Monday. So what did the Russian do to turn the match around?

headline.print_headline: Kuznetsova Brings New Meaning to Cuts and Slices
headline.main: Kuznetsova Brings New Meaning to Cuts and Slices
